column2: title=Shenandoah (The Washington and Lee University Review): A Tribute to Wystan Hugh Auden on his Sixtieth Birthday

column1: '''''Shenandoah: A Tribute to Wystan Hugh Auden on his Sixtieth Birthday''''' is a tribute volume to [[W.H. Auden]], containing the poem ''[[For W.H.A.]] - in Modern and Old English'' by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] (pp.96-97).
